string.name: hiUser
string.comment: %s is the title+username e.g. 'GM ABC' or simply ABC if there is no title

string.name: awaitQuestion
string.comment: Displayed while waiting for results

resources.string: Â¿QuÃ© has estado haciendo este aÃ±o?
No has jugado ninguna partida este aÃ±o.

string.name: gamesYouWon
string.comment: %s is the number of games won

string.name: gamesNextQuestion
string.comment:
Appears in the recap to set up some questions about the games you have played.
In context, it appears in this sequence:
"What a chess year you've had!" "You played %s games this year" "And you won %s of them!"
"What did it takes to get there?" <--- THIS MESSAGE
"ğ‘¦ {minutes/hours/days} spent playing" "{That is way too much chess./That is a lot of chess./That seems like a reasonable about of chess.}" "That's ğ‘¥g of wood pushed"
There are more messages afterwards but it should give an idea of where it appears.

resources.string: Â¿QuÃ© te ha llevado hasta allÃ­?

string.name: timeSpentPlayingExclam
string.comment: %s is the time spent playing animated from 0 e.g. '1 day, 17 hours'. The time is also translated

resources.string: Parece una cantidad razonable de ajedrez.
Â¿CuÃ¡ntos movimientos has hecho en todo ese tiempo?

string.name: movesOfWoodPushed
string.comment:
%s is a weight in grams or kilograms
This shows you the weight from all the moves you made in the year, if you were moving wooden pieces.

string.name: movesStandardPiecesWeight
string.comment: 40g as in 40 grams

resources.string: Las piezas estÃ¡ndar pesan alrededor de 40 gramos cada una

string.name: chessFoes
string.comment: Best as in strongest opponents.

string.name: firstMoveStats
string.comment:
%s is the number of games played and their percentage of the total, in parentheses.
Subtitle to your most played move e.g. '1. e4'.
e.g. "1. e4 is how you started 50 (67%) of your games as white" Meaning you played 50 games as white over the past year, which was 67% of the games you played as white.

resources.string: es como iniciaste el %s de tus partidas con blancas
